Containers.Name: binhex-sickbeard
Containers.Description: Sick Beard is a PVR for newsgroup users (with limited torrent support). It watches for new episodes of your favorite shows and when they are posted it downloads them, sorts and renames them, and optionally generates metadata for them. It currently supports NZBs.org, NZBMatrix, NZBs'R'Us, Newzbin, Womble's Index, NZB.su, TVTorrents and EZRSS and retrieves show information from theTVDB.com and TVRage.com.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] This is where sickbeard will store it's configuration file, database and logs.[br] [b]/data[/b] This path is used retrieve the downloaded files by your downloader application.[br] [b]/media[/b] This is where sickbeard will scan for media files.
